17 namespace tsa {
18 
19  RLSCanceler::RLSCanceler(unsigned int Order, double delta, double lambda, unsigned int Channels)
20  :
21  mP(Order + 1),
22  mdelta(delta),
23  mlambda(lambda),
24  mWeights(Channels, Order + 1),
25  mC(Order + 1, Order + 1),
26  mX(Order + 1),
27  mM(Order + 1),
28  mG(Order + 1),
29  mlstart(0.0),
30  msigma(0.0) {
31 
32  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mP; j++) {
33  mX(j) = 0.0;
34  for (unsigned int k = 0; k < mP; k++)
35  mC(j, k) = 0.0;
36  for (unsigned int k = 0; k < Channels; k++)
37  mWeights(k, j) = 0.0;
38  }
39  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mP; j++)
40  mC(j, j) = mdelta;
41 
42  }
43

48  RLSCanceler::~RLSCanceler() {
49  }

56  RLSCanceler::RLSCanceler(const RLSCanceler& from) {
57  }

59  void RLSCanceler::operator()(SeqViewDouble& InputData, SeqViewDouble& CleanedData) {
60  Dmatrix* arg1 = InputData.GetData();
61  Dmatrix* arg2 = CleanedData.GetData();
62 
63  if ((arg1->size1() != arg2->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg2->size2())) {
64  arg2->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
65  arg2->clear();
66  LogWarning("NotchWidrow: resizing output array");
67  }
68  CleanedData.SetStart(InputData.GetStart());
69  CleanedData.SetSampling(InputData.GetSampling());
70  execute(*arg1, *arg2);
71 
72  }
73 
74  void RLSCanceler::operator()(SeqViewDouble& InputData, SeqViewDouble& CleanedData, SeqViewDouble& ReferenceSignal) {
75  Dmatrix* arg1 = InputData.GetData();
76  Dmatrix* arg2 = CleanedData.GetData();
77  Dmatrix* arg3 = ReferenceSignal.GetData();
78 
79  if ((arg1->size1() != arg2->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg2->size2())) {
80  arg2->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
81  arg2->clear();
82  LogWarning("RLSCanceler: resizing output array");
83  }
84  if ((arg1->size1() != arg3->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg3->size2())) {
85  arg3->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
86  arg3->clear();
87  LogWarning("RLSCanceler: resizing reference array");
88  }
89  CleanedData.SetStart(InputData.GetStart());
90  CleanedData.SetSampling(InputData.GetSampling());
91  execute(*arg1, *arg2, *arg3);
92 
93  ReferenceSignal.SetStart(InputData.GetStart());
94  ReferenceSignal.SetSampling(InputData.GetSampling());
95  }
96 
97  void RLSCanceler::execute(Dmatrix& Input, Dmatrix& Output, Dmatrix& ReferenceSignal) {
98  if (Input.size1() != mWeights.size1()) {
99  mWeights.resize(Input.size1(), mP, true);
100  mWeights.clear();
101  LogWarning("RLSCanceler: number of channels changed, weights reset");
102  }
103 
104  /*operation*/
105  double out, dat, erf, mu;
106 
107  for (unsigned int Channel = 0; Channel < Input.size1(); Channel++) {
108  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Input.size2(); i++) {
109 
110  dat = Input(Channel, i);
111 
112  out = 0.0;
113  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mP; k++)
114  out += mWeights(Channel, k) * mX(k);
115 
116  /*form prediction error*/
117 
118  erf = dat - out;
119 
120  /* Calculate new gain vector*/
121  mM = prod(mC, mX);
122 
123  mu = inner_prod(mM, mX);
124 
125  mG = mM / (mlambda + mu);
126 
127  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mP; k++)
128  mWeights(Channel, k) += mG(k) * erf;
129 
130  /* Update matrix inverse for the next time iteration */
131 
132  mC = (1.0 / mlambda)*(mC - outer_prod(mG, mM));
133 
134  msigma += erf*erf;
135 
136  for (unsigned int k = mP - 1; k > 1; k--)
137  mX(k) = mX(k - 1);
138  mX(1) = ReferenceSignal(Channel, i);
139 
140  Output(Channel, i) = erf;
141  }
142  mlstart += (double) Input.size2();
143 
144  mWeights(Channel, 0) = sqrt(msigma / mlstart);
145  }
146  }
147 
148  void RLSCanceler::execute(Dmatrix& Input, Dmatrix& Output) {
149  if (Input.size1() != mWeights.size1()) {
150  mWeights.resize(Input.size1(), mP, true);
151  mWeights.clear();
152  LogWarning("RLSCanceler: number of channels changed, weights reset");
153  }
154 
155  /*operation*/
156  double out, dat, erf, mu;
157 
158  for (unsigned int Channel = 0; Channel < Input.size1(); Channel++) {
159  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Input.size2(); i++) {
160 
161  dat = Input(Channel, i);
162 
163  out = 0.0;
164  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mP; k++)
165  out += mWeights(Channel, k) * mX(k);
166 
167  /*form prediction error*/
168 
169  erf = dat - out;
170 
171  /* Calculate new gain vector*/
172  mM = prod(mC, mX);
173 
174  mu = inner_prod(mM, mX);
175 
176  mG = mM / (mlambda + mu);
177 
178  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mP; k++)
179  mWeights(Channel, k) += mG(k) * erf;
180 
181  /* Update matrix inverse for the next time iteration */
182 
183  mC = (1.0 / mlambda)*(mC - outer_prod(mG, mM));
184 
185  msigma += erf*erf;
186 
187  for (unsigned int k = mP - 1; k > 1; k--)
188  mX(k) = mX(k - 1);
189  mX(1) = Input(Channel, i);
190 
191  Output(Channel, i) = erf;
192  }
193  mlstart += (double) Input.size2();
194 
195  mWeights(Channel, 0) = sqrt(msigma / mlstart);
196  }
197  }
